name: Roll20
0:
”Alexa open Roll Twenty and roll”
”Alexa ask Roll Twenty to give me a new roll”
”Alexa ask Roll Twenty for new roll”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: roll twenty
des: This skill allows Alexa to roll a 20 sided die for you in case you need one for games like DnD.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
